remarks: Implicit substitution of 2 classes for 2 setvar variables.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-1995.)
statement:
vtocl2g.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
vtocl2g.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
vtocl2g.3 $e |- ph $.
vtocl2g $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ch ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d ch y $.
$d ps x $.
